name: BrainBoom - Word Brain Games
description:
Test your brain in a joyful way! Guess words, sharp your mind and kill boredom!

Are you fans of brain teasers? Exercise your brain with hundreds of word riddles. From fun to silly, easy to extremely difficult, these witty word Riddles will surely entertain you for hours and to increase your vocabulary and train your brain limit!



How to play:
- Read the riddles and guess the answer.
- Spell the hidden words by placing the letters in the blocks in the correct order.
- In the beginning, simple riddles are waiting for you, but with increasing level their complexity will increase.
- Use hints will help you solve the word riddles.

Guess the words and have fun! Challenging word puzzles will light up your day!
